name: NACRA 36
notes:
Originally called ROLAND 36.
The NACRA 36 was actually the first boat created with the North American Catamaran Racing Association (NACRA) in mind. When interest proved to be less than hoped for, a scaled down version was developed. (NACRA 5.2)
Significantly re-designed in the mid-1990's for production in Australia.
Thanks to Bob Hoffman for additional information.
